thread.title: How Does TWO Victoria’s Sports Bras AND a Robe for $27 Shipped Sound? Order Soon! – Ends at 2AM EST
thread.title_full: How Does TWO Victoria’s Sports Bras AND a Robe for $27 Shipped Sound? Order Soon! – Ends at 2AM EST

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: How Does TWO Victoria’s Sports Bras AND a Robe for $27 Shipped Sound? Order Soon! – Ends at 2AM EST
text:
Stop watching the Super Bowl – this is *HOT*! If you’re a fan of Victoria’s Secret, you’ve got to take advantage of this offer! Through 2AM EST, Victoria’s Secret is offering up FREE Shipping on $25+ Orders when you enter the promo code SHIP25 at checkout! Even sweeter, you can score an additional 20% off ONE Single Item when you enter the promo code ITEM20 at checkout (discount will apply to highest priced item in cart). AND – you can stack up to three promo codes per order.

Need sports bras? Consider this! Buy 2 The Player Racerback Sport Bras $15 each 
Enter the promo code SWEETHEART (free robe with purchase of 2 bras) 
Enter the code SHIP25 (free shipping on $25) 
Enter the code ITEM20 (20% off one item)
Final cost $27 shipped for two bras and robe – just $9 each!
